game_description: The first rule of Zen is "Do One Thing At A Time". Zen Monkeys is a Zen-like playground to quiet your mind, relax, and hang. Build chains of Zen Monkeys in a peaceful and serene environment that is fun and calm. Zen Monkeys is a simple straight forward experience in VR. A peaceful place to chill, climb, and hang. Zen-Monkeys features: Unlimited Physics Based Zen Monkeys: Use as many as you'd like! A completely climbable set of Monkey Bars to hang your Zen Monkeys. Dual-wield squirt guns to shoot down the chains you've created. Ability To Change The Monkey's Color Music Selection Added Current DLC: Locking Monkey FREE DLC New Space Environment DLC New Open World "The Islands" DLC New Open World "Zen City" with "Zen Run" mini-game DLC New Open World "Zen Archery" with mini-games DLC Zen Monkeys is a fun and relaxing getaway from school, work, chores or anything. So release your Zen!
review_2: This game is very fun. Such a simple concept, but a lot of fun. It's a great way to just chill out with no stress.
